cz.syntea.xdef.xml

Class KDOMBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder
      • cz.syntea.xdef.xml.KDOMBuilder

  • public class KDOMBuilder
extends javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder
    Provides creating and parsing XML data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      KDOMBuilder()
      Creates a new instance of KDomBuilder with KDOMParser and S_Document.

      • newDocument

        public final org.w3c.dom.Document newDocument(java.lang.String nsURI,
                                              java.lang.String qname,
                                              org.w3c.dom.DocumentType docType)
        Creates an XML Document object with empty root element created by document builder (see SetDOMImplementation).
        Parameters:
        nsURI - namespace of created root element (or null).
        qname - qualified name of root element.
        docType - DocumentType object or null.
        Returns:
        new Document object with empty root element.

      • setCoalescing

        public final void setCoalescing(boolean coalescing)
        Specifies that the DOM parser code will convert CDATA nodes to Text nodes and append it to the adjacent (if any) text node. By default the value of this is set to true.
        Parameters:
        coalescing - true if the DOM parser will convert CDATA nodes to Text nodes and append it to the adjacent (if any) text node; false otherwise.

      • isCoalescing

        public final boolean isCoalescing()
        Get value of the coalescing switch.
        Returns:
        the coalescing switch.

      • setNamespaceAware

        public final void setNamespaceAware(boolean namespaceAware)
        Specifies that the DOM parser will provide support for XML namespaces. By default the value of this is set to true.
        Parameters:
        namespaceAware - true if the DOM parser will provide support for XML namespaces; false otherwise.

        Parse XML from InputStream.
        Parameters:

        closeStream - if true the input stream is closed after parsing.
        Returns:
        object org.w3c.dom.Document with parsed XML document.

      • parse

        public final org.w3c.dom.Document parse(org.xml.sax.InputSource is)
                                 throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        Specified by:
        parse in class javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException

      • parse

        public final org.w3c.dom.Document parse(org.xml.sax.InputSource is,
                                        boolean closeStream)
                                 throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        Parse the content of the given input source as an XML document and return a new DOM Document object. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the InputSource is null null.
        Parameters:
        is - InputSource containing the content to be parsed.
        closeStream - if true the input stream is closed after parsing.
        Returns:
        A new DOM Document object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any IO errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur.
        See Also:
        DocumentHandler
